issue.title: [C++] BitUtil::SetBitsTo probably doesn't need to be inline
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8793](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8793). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Inlining this function probably does not yield meaningful performance benefits

comments.body:
